#summary BigBlueButton LTI implementation.


= Overview =

The bbb-lti service is a component that enables a BigBlueButton server to act as a Learning Tools Interoperability ([http://developers.imsglobal.org/ LTI]) Tool in any Learning Management System (LMS) supporting the LTI standard.

Example LTI compliant LMSs are Moodle, Sakai, Canvas and Blackboard ([http://www.imsglobal.org/cc/statuschart.cfm See IMS Interoperability Conformance Certification Status]).
